bibl.title: The Vicissitudinous History of the Athenogenes-Papyrus and its Edition. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Introductory overview of the events [the feud between E. Revillout and other French scholars]. - The reconstructed chronology of the events. - The place of the fragments, the formation of the vitrines. - Appendix: HYPERIDES, In Athenogenem [= P. Paris Louvre Inv. 9331/10438] (= M.-P.3 1235; LDAB 2430), col. xvi, 1.
bibl.seg: HORVÁTH László, The Vicissitudinous History of the Athenogenes-Papyrus and its Edition. Avec résumé en anglais.

Introductory overview of the events [the feud between E. Revillout and other French scholars]. - The reconstructed chronology of the events. - The place of the fragments, the formation of the vitrines. - Appendix: HYPERIDES, In Athenogenem [= P. Paris Louvre Inv. 9331/10438] (= M.-P.3 1235; LDAB 2430), col. xvi, 1.
